page.title: 14SHOTESHAM/HOWE POPULATION
page.content:
The{POPULATION}is constant at under 500 and is centered on the main streets in the villages. The remainder is scattered over the whole area both on farms and in isolated houses. Social Mix, this is varied and includes skilled and unskilled manual workers from farms and industry, Tradesmen, Businessmen and Professionals many of whom work in the nearby city.
{AGES}within the community: There are a smaller number of the very young and teenagers than in the past. {PROPERTY}in the area is relatively expensive consequently there are few young marrieds. The retired and better off working community form a larger proportion of the people. Working farmers, though they are few in number own a majority of the land.
